messages.message:
hi team, in build, i am not able to make the extraction bigger for a full summary (see screenshot)
The only way is to click into it, but than i A) lose the formatting and B) am in the editing mode, which i dont want

The table field below, i am able to scroll down to see the full table.

Is this on purpose?

cc: @shahz.shuja

Btw this is for Human Review, not Build

Yes, currently this is expected behavior, but I’ll create a ticket to track the desired improvement
